Name: LU 8 - Zoning, 2892 Nostrand Avenue Rezoning, Brooklyn (C 200329 ZMK)
Title: Resolution approving the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 200329 ZMK, a Zoning Map amendment (Preconsidered L.U. No. 8).

History.Action: Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by Roll Call.

{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f1\fswiss\fprq2\fcharset0 Arial;}}
{\colortbl ;\red0\green0\blue0;\red255\green255\blue0;}
\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Salamanca and Riley\b0\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, Mikerose Realty, Inc.,\expndtw-6  filed an application \expndtw0 pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 23b, changing from an R3-2 District to an R6B District, changing from an R3-2 District to an R7A District, establishing within the proposed R6B District a C2-4 District, and establishing within the proposed R7A District a C2-4 District, which in conjunction with the related action \cf1 would facilitate the development of a new nine-story, approximately 43,000-square-foot mixed-use development that would\cf0\fs16  \cf1\fs24 contain\cf0  approximately 3,800 square feet of commercial use and approximately 3,600 square feet of community facility use, as well as 55 residential units, approximately 14 of which would be designated as permanently affordable pursuant to the Mandatory Inclusionary Housing (MIH) program, \cf1 at \cf0 2892 Nostrand Avenue in the Madison neighborhood of Community District 15, Brooklyn (ULURP No. C 200329 ZMK) (the "Application");\par
\par
WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on January 21, 2022 its decision dated January 5, 2022 (the "Decision") on the Application;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tqr\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1440\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7920 WHEREAS, the Application is related to application N 200328 ZRK (Pre. L.U. No. 9), a zoning text amendment to designate an MIH area coterminous with the project area;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7560\tx7920\tx8640\tx8933\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on January 27, 2022;\par
\par
WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the Negative Declaration issued August 16\super th\nosupersub , 2021 (CEQR No. \cf1 20DCP148K\cf0 ), which includes an (E) designation to avoid the potential for significant adverse impacts related to hazardous materials, air quality, and noise (E-579) (the \ldblquote Negative Declaration\rdblquote ).\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj  \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx720 The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the (E) Designation (E-579) and Negative Declaration.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj Pursuant to Sections 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 200329 ZMK, incorporated by reference herein, and the record before the Council, the Council approves the Decision of the City Planning Commission.\par
\pard\ltrpar\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560 The Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, effective as of December 15, 1961, and as subsequently amended, is further amended by changing the Zoning Map, Section No. 23b:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-360\li720\qj\lang4105 1.\tab changing from an R3-2 District to an R6B District property bounded by a line 800 feet northerly of Avenue P, Nostrand Avenue, a line 700 feet northerly of Avenue P, and a line 110 feet westerly of Nostrand Avenue;  \par
\pard\ltrpar\fi60\li720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-360\li720\qj 2.\tab changing from an R3-2 District to an R7A District property bounded by a line 700 feet northerly of Avenue P, Nostrand Avenue, a line 300 feet northerly of Avenue P, and a line 110 feet westerly of Nostrand Avenue;  \par
\pard\ltrpar\fi60\li720\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-360\li720\qj 3.\tab establishing within the proposed R6B District a C2-4 District bounded by a line 800 feet northerly of Avenue P, Nostrand Avenue, a line 700 feet northerly of Avenue P, and a line 110 feet westerly of Nostrand Avenue; \par
\pard\ltrpar\fi60\li720\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-360\li720\qj 4.\tab establishing within the proposed R7A District a C2-4 District bounded by a line 700 feet northerly of Avenue P, Nostrand Avenue, a line 540 feet northerly of Avenue P, and a line 110 feet westerly of Nostrand Avenue;  \par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\highlight2\f1\fs18\par
\pard\ltrpar\highlight0\f0\fs24 as shown on a diagram (for illustrative purposes only) dated August 16, 2021, and subject to the conditions of CEQR Declaration E-579, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 15.\f1\fs18\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560\lang1033\f0\fs24\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj Adopted.\par
\par
\tab Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\qj I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on ______________, 2022, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\par
